Actions.Text: REPORTED REFERRED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Votes.VoteType: Favorable refer to committee Ways and Means

Title: Creates the jockey health insurance reserve fund
Summary: Creates the jockey health insurance reserve fund for the payment of premiums not yet paid; provides for the return of funds if such reserve fund becomes no longer necessary.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to the creation of the jockey health insurance reserve fund
